name: Basic Funerals and Cremation Choices
tag_list: funeral-homes, chicago-funerals, funerals-service, cremation-chicago-funeral-home, chicago-funeral-homes, chicago-funeral, funerals-in-chicago
overview: We don’t force you to come to our funeral home. Arrangements online, over the phone, or in person in your own home. We use beautiful existing locations across Chicago to hold funeral services. (Not other funeral homes, we’re not a broker)We answer all your questions over the phone. (Trust us, this is rare)We provide you with a complete price with no hidden costs right on our website. We have enabled our website to email your quote to you. We have real time chat for those that prefer this method. We can provide services across a larger area we decided that using technology to serve you better was more important than owning a big fancy funeral home.
